faqs.q1: How quickly can I get my loan approved?
faqs.a1: Our instant decision system provides a preliminary approval in less than 5 minutes. Final approval typically takes 24 to 48 hours after document verification.
faqs.q2: What is the minimum required credit score?
faqs.a2: We accept applications from clients with various credit profiles. While a score above 650 improves your chances, we evaluate each application individually.
faqs.q3: Can I pay off my loan early without penalties?
faqs.a3: Yes, all our loans allow early repayment without penalties. You'll save on interest by paying off your loan sooner.
faqs.q4: What documents do I need to provide to apply?
faqs.a4: You'll need a valid ID, proof of income (last 3 pay stubs), bank statements, and proof of address. Additional documents may be requested based on your situation.
faqs.q5: How is my monthly payment calculated?
faqs.a5: Your monthly payment depends on the loan amount, duration, and your APR. Use our simulator above for an instant calculation tailored to your needs.
faqs.q6: Does checking rates affect my credit score?
faqs.a6: No, checking your eligibility does not affect your credit score. Only the formal credit application will be recorded in your credit history.

about.title: About Privat Equity
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for transparent and personalized credit solutions
about.intro1: Privat Equity is an innovative online lending platform revolutionizing credit access in France. Founded with the mission of making personal financing more transparent, accessible, and fair, we connect thousands of borrowers with the best credit offers on the market.
about.intro2: Our platform uses cutting-edge technology to analyze your financial profile and offer you personalized offers in minutes. We work with a carefully selected network of financial partners to ensure you always get the best possible conditions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Democratize access to credit by offering transparent, fast, and tailored financing solutions to everyone's needs. We believe everyone deserves access to fair financing options, regardless of their profile.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Transparency, integrity, and customer respect are at the heart of everything we do. We are committed to providing clear information, with no hidden fees, and treating each customer with the respect they deserve.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.description: We use the most advanced security technologies to protect your personal data. Our platform is fully GDPR compliant and we are regulated by French financial authorities.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: With over 15 years of combined experience in the financial sector, our team understands the challenges borrowers face. We use this expertise to create a lending experience that is simple, fast, and tailored to your needs.
